document_data.caption: A map showing Amrani's Laundry (labeled #4) on Slop Street.
document_data.name: Amrani's Laundry
document_data.mainbody: '''Amrani's Laundry''' was a business located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The building stood one story tall.
document_data.Location: Amrani's Laundry was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]] within the [[Waterdeep/Adventurers' Quarter|Adventurers' Quarter]]. The front of the building lay along the west side of [[Slop Street]], while the rear of the building faced [[Kolat Towers]] on [[Weeping Maiden's Run]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Adventurers' Quarter}}
document_data.Inhabitants: The business was owned by [[Amrani]] in the {{YearlinkName|1372}}.
